old:
ん？　もう報酬は受け取っただろう？
また次回の任務でな
column2:
Hmm? You've already received your reward, haven't you?
Another mission will be available next time.

old:
先の森の魔物討伐における報酬を
支給している
まだ受け取っていないなら
保管ボックスから受け取るといい
column2:
Rewards for defeating the forest monsters have been paid to

If you haven't received them yet, you can receive them from the storage box at

old:
先の戦闘の評価でお前の活躍は相当のものだった
追加報酬として
シークレットアビリティが送られることになった
これがその報酬だ
column2:
Your performance in the evaluation of the last battle was considerable
As an additional reward
you will be sent a Secret Ability
Here's the reward

old:
解決してもすぐまた次の問題が湧いて出る
困ったものだ
column2:
Even if you solve it, another problem immediately emerges.
Troublesome indeed.

old:
――それにしても
少し前から《古の祭祀場》での魔物報告が
相次いでいる
column2: ――However, there have been frequent reports of enemies at the Ancient Place of Rituals since a while ago.

old:
竜力が淀みやすい場所だとは聞いていたが
こうも続くとは――
お互い気が抜けんな
column2:
I've heard it's a place where dragon power tends to stagnate.
I didn't think it would last this long--
We can't let up on each other.

old:
あまり話しかけてくれるなよ？
団には覚者を良く思わない者が多いからな
column2:
Don't talk to me too much, okay?
There are a lot of people in the group who don't take kindly to Arisen people.

old:
夜や雨天は、普段とは違う魔物が現れる
ま、外に出る時は天候も気をつけることだ
column2:
At night and in the rain, unusual demons appear.
Well, when you go outside, be aware of the weather too!

old:
エントリーは歓迎するが、お前は先になすべき
ミッションがあるみたいだな
そちらを終わらせるか、取り消してから
あらためて顔を出してくれ
column2:
You're welcome to enter, but it looks like you have a mission to do first

finish that one or cancel it and then
show up again.

old:
さきほど入った《古の祭祀場》最新情報に
よれば魔物は今姿を晦ましているようだ
出現情報が入り次第、エントリー受付を再開する
column2:
According to the latest information from the
Ancient Place of Rituals, the enemies seem to have disappeared
. We will reopen the entry reception as soon as we receive information about their appearance

old:
どうにか《古の祭祀場》の件は事なきを得た
――お前への報酬は今回出ていないが
エントの確認など、協力の噂は聞いていたぞ
次は力を借りることになりそうだな
column2:
Somehow we managed to get the "Ancient Ritual Hall" thing off the ground.
--No reward for you this time, but
I've heard rumors of cooperation, including confirmation of the Ent.
I guess I'll be asking for your help next time.

old:
ふん――
レオが姿を消したと聞いてどうなることかと
思っていたが――
column2:
Hmm--
I was wondering what would happen when I heard Leo had disappeared
but--

old: せいぜい、仲良くしようではないか

覚者になりたいと思うこともあったが
おまえを見ていてわかったよ
column2:
There were times I wanted to be a Arisen, but I knew it when I saw
you.

old:
集団の力を信じ、その一部であることに
喜びを感じるわたしは
覚者には向いていないようだ
column2:
I believe in the power of the collective and take pleasure
in being part of it, but I
don't think I'm cut out to be an Arisen person.
